alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Charlevoix; Crawford; Grand Traverse; Kalkaska; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Grand Traverse, southwestern Otsego, Antrim, northwestern Crawford, Kalkaska and south central Charlevoix Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Boardman, or 7 miles southwest of Kalkaska, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kalkaska and Sigma around 1155 PM EDT. Darragh around 1200 AM EDT. Mancelona and Antrim around 1205 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Alba, Elmira, Otsego Lake State Park and Gaylord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Antrim; Charlevoix; Crawford; Grand Traverse; Kalkaska; Otsego
